# Tidy Tuesday week 42

## Get data

```{r}
library(tidytuesdayR)
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2020, week = 42)
```

## Explore

```{r}
library(dplyr)
tuesdata$datasaurus %>% glimpse()
datasaurus = tuesdata$datasaurus
```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
p = ggplot(tuesdata$datasaurus, aes(x, y, color = dataset)) +
  geom_point(show.legend = F) +
  gganimate::transition_states(dataset)
  # geom_abline() +
  # facet_wrap(~dataset)
ggMarginal(p, groupColour = T, groupFill = T)



ggscatterhist(
  datasaurus %>% filter(dataset == 'away'), 
  'x', 'y', color = 'dataset', margin.params = list(fill = 'dataset'), legend = 'none' 
) 

library(ggforce)
ggplot(tuesdata$datasaurus, aes(x, y, color = dataset)) +
  geom_point(show.legend = F) +
  facet_matrix(vars(dataset))
```

```{r}
windows()
# Load fonts
emojifont::load.emojifont(font = "OpenSansEmoji.ttf")
```


```{r, fig.showtext=T}
library(ggplot2)
library(emojifont)
p = ggplot(champions, aes(x = year, y = reorder(school, champ_wins))) +
  # geom_point() +
  emojifont::geom_emoji(
    alias = 'basketball',
    x = champions$year,
    y = reorder(champions$school,champions$champ_wins),
    size = 16, color = '#D44500', vjust = 0.1
  ) +
  labs(
    x = '', y = '',
    title = "NCAA Women's Basketball Champions", 
    subtitle = "1982-2018",
    caption = "Data: FiveThirtyEight. Visualization: @loreabad6"
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(1982, 2018, 2)) +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(
    text = element_text(family = "mono", size = 30),
    panel.grid = element_line(size = 0.35)
  )
```

## Save plot
```{r, fig.showtext=T}
ggsave(p, filename = "plot/2020_week_41.png", device = "png", width = 25, height = 12, units = "cm", dpi = 300)
```
